role.argrole: thing being harmed,sometimes marked by ب

example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM بقاؤ) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC فترة) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC طويلة)) (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يضر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN السياحة))) (PP-LOC (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الجزيرة))))) (PUNC "))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: *T*-1 < their remaining there for a long time
